content.text:
The Lenovo ThinkCentre X1 all-in-one PC delivers a new kind of desktop experience—with a stunning notebook-thin design and groundbreaking dependability. Discover Intel® Core™ i7 vPro™ processor performance, enhanced security features, and a brilliant widescreen antiglare display. It’s the perfect way to get supercharged productivity that looks good, too.

Get a better brand of business PC with the ThinkCentre X1 all-in-one PC.

features.name: Style and Substance
features.text: The Lenovo ThinkCentre X1 has it all—a notebook-thin aluminum chassis, backed by Intel® Core™ i7 vPro™ processor performance. The result is high style and high productivity, aimed squarely at today’s enterprise PC users’ wants and needs.

features.name: Vibrant Display
features.text: Slim in profile, the vibrant widescreen Full HD antiglare display has been treated to prevent glare—even under bright lights. Plus, it can be tilted forward or backward to get the perfect viewing angle.

features.name: Clutter-Free Connectivity
features.text: With an intelligent DP port, the ThinkCentre X1 can be used as a second display for mobile devices or paired with another desktop display. And your most important peripherals (mouse, keyboard, webcam, and audio devices) can be connected via WiGig for wireless, clutter-free performance.

features.name: Security Innovation
features.text: The ThinkCentre X1 can be secured in place with the Kensington Lock slot or the optional low-profile VESA wall mount accessory. Integrated security features also include Trusted Platform Module (TPM) and Smart USB protection.
